name: Toad &Co Samba Muse Dress - Women's
description:
Get dressed in 60 seconds, all summer long. This versatile dress is made from a soft and durable organic cotton blend, with just enough stretch to move with you through any adventure.Silky, sustainable organic cotton and Tencel blend fabricSlight slub texture adds dimension.Adjustable waist lets you tune the fit.
